amendment.description: Amendment sought to add the Secretary of Transportation to a study to increase incentives for the sharing of critical infrastructure information with the Department of Homeland Security.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (NY) amendment (A011) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. King (NY).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the King (NY) amendment (A011) Failed by voice vote.
